import cv2

import cv2
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
img=cv2.imread("img/test.png")
height, width = img.shape[:2]
half_height = height //2
mask = np.zeros(img.shape[:2], dtype=np.uint8)
mask[half_height :height, :] =255
histb = cv2.calcHist([img],[0],mask,[256],[0,255])
histg = cv2.calcHist([img],[1],mask,[256],[0,255])
histr = cv2.calcHist([img],[2],mask,[256],[0,255])
plt.plot(histb,color='b')
plt.plot(histg,color='g')
plt.plot(histr,color='r')
plt.show()
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


img = cv2.imread('img/img/test.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if img is None:
    raise FileNotFoundError("错误")

hist_original = cv2.calcHist([img], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])

img_eq = cv2.equalizeHist(img)
hist_eq = cv2.calcHist([img_eq], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])


plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))

plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
plt.imshow(img, cmap='gray')
plt.title('Original Image')
plt.axis('off')

plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.plot(hist_original, color='black')
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])

plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
plt.imshow(img_eq, cmap='gray')
plt.title('Equalized Image')
plt.axis('off')

plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
plt.plot(hist_eq, color='black')
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])

plt.suptitle('Image Processing - Created by [你的名字]', y=0.98)

plt.savefig('result.png')
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

img = cv2.imread('img/img/test.png')
if img is None:
    raise FileNotFoundError("无法加载图片，请检查路径是否正确")

b, g, r = cv2.split(img)

clahe = cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5, tileGridSize=(10, 10))

b_eq = clahe.apply(b)
g_eq = clahe.apply(g)
r_eq = clahe.apply(r)

img_eq = cv2.merge((b_eq, g_eq, r_eq))

hist_b = cv2.calcHist([b_eq], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
hist_g = cv2.calcHist([g_eq], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
hist_r = cv2.calcHist([r_eq], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])

plt.figure(figsize=(18, 12))

plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
plt.imshow(cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB))
plt.title('Original Image')
plt.axis('off')

plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.imshow(cv2.cvtColor(img_eq, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB))
plt.title('CLAHE Equalized Image')
plt.axis('off')

plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
plt.plot(hist_b, color='blue', label='Blue')
plt.plot(hist_g, color='green', label='Green')
plt.plot(hist_r, color='red', label='Red')
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.legend()

plt.suptitle('CLAHE Image Processing - Created by [你的名字]', y=0.98)

plt.savefig('clahe_result.png')
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
img=cv2.imread("img/img/test.png")
b,g,r=cv2.split(img)
clah=cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5,tileGridSize=(10,10))
equb=clah.apply(b)
equg=clah.apply(g)
equr=clah.apply(r)
img_new=cv2.merge([equb,equg,equr])
histb = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[0],None,[256],[0,255])
histg = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[1],None,[256],[0,255])
histr = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[2],None,[256],[0,255])
plt.plot(histb,color='b')
plt.plot(histg,color='g')
plt.plot(histr,color='r')
plt.show()
cv2.imshow("LSM-img",img)
cv2.imshow("LSM-img_new",img_new)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
name = "yt"
def show_image_with_name(image, title, cmap=None):
plt.imshow(image, cmap=cmap)
plt.title(title)
plt.text(image.shape[1]//2, 10, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.axis('off')
image_path = 'img/test.png'
image = cv2.imread(image_path)
gray_image = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
original_hist = cv2.calcHist([gray_image], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
equalized_image = cv2.equalizeHist(gray_image)
equalized_hist = cv2.calcHist([equalized_image], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
show_image_with_name(gray_image, 'Original Image', 'gray')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.plot(original_hist, color='black')
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.text(128, max(original_hist)/2, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
show_image_with_name(equalized_image, 'Equalized Image', 'gray')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
plt.plot(equalized_hist, color='black')
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.text(128, max(equalized_hist)/2, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('histogram_equalization_result.png')
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
name = "yt"
def show_image_with_name(image, title, cmap=None):
plt.imshow(image, cmap=cmap)
plt.title(title)
plt.text(image.shape[1]//2, 10, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.axis('off')
image_path = 'img/test.png'
image = cv2.imread(image_path)
b, g, r = cv2.split(image)
clahe = cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5, tileGridSize=(10, 10))
b_clahe = clahe.apply(b)
g_clahe = clahe.apply(g)
r_clahe = clahe.apply(r)
equalized_image = cv2.merge((b_clahe, g_clahe, r_clahe))
colors = ('b', 'g', 'r')
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Original Image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(equalized_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Equalized Image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
for i, color in enumerate(colors):
hist = cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256])
plt.plot(hist, color=color)
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.text(128, max(np.max(hist) for hist in [cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256]) for i in range(3)])/2, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')

plt.title("Equalized Image")

histr_eq = cv2.calcHist([img_eq],[2],None,[256],[0,255])

b_clahe = clahe.apply(b)
g_clahe = clahe.apply(g)
r_clahe = clahe.apply(r)

equalized_image = cv2.merge((b_clahe, g_clahe, r_clahe))

colors = ('b', 'g', 'r')
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))

plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Original Image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(equalized_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Equalized Image')

plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
for i, color in enumerate(colors):
   hist = cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256])
   plt.plot(hist, color=color)
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.text(128, max(np.max(hist) for hist in [cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256]) for i in range(3)])/2, name,
        color='red', fontsize=12,
        alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')


plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
for i, color in enumerate(colors):
   hist = cv2.calcHist([equalized_image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256])
   plt.plot(hist, color=color)
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.text(128, max(np.max(hist) for hist in [cv2.calcHist([equalized_image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256]) for i in range(3)])/2, name,
        color='red', fontsize=12,
        alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')

plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('clahe_equalization_result.png')  
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
img_path = 'img/puke.png'
img = cv2.imread(img_path)
if img is None:
    raise FileNotFoundError(f"图片未找到，请检查路径: {img_path}")
gray_img = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
hist_original = cv2.calcHist([gray_img], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
equalized_img = cv2.equalizeHist(gray_img)
hist_equalized = cv2.calcHist([equalized_img], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
plt.imshow(gray_img, cmap='gray')
plt.title('Original Image')
plt.axis('off')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.plot(hist_original, color='black')
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
plt.imshow(equalized_img, cmap='gray')
plt.title('Equalized Image')
plt.axis('off')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
plt.plot(hist_equalized, color='black')
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
img_path = 'img/puke.png'

if img is None:
    raise FileNotFoundError(f"图片未找到，请检查路径: {img_path}")
b, g, r = cv2.split(img)
clahe = cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5, tileGridSize=(10, 10))
b_eq = clahe.apply(b)
g_eq = clahe.apply(g)
r_eq = clahe.apply(r)
equalized_img = cv2.merge([b_eq, g_eq, r_eq])
hist_original = cv2.calcHist([g], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
hist_equalized = cv2.calcHist([g_eq], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])

plt.title('Original Image')

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
name = "XYD"
def show_image_with_name(image, title, cmap=None):
   plt.imshow(image, cmap=cmap)
   plt.title(title)
   plt.text(image.shape[1]//2, 10, name,
            color='red', fontsize=12,
            alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
   plt.axis('off')
image_path = 'img/test.png'
image = cv2.imread(image_path)
gray_image = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
original_hist = cv2.calcHist([gray_image], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
equalized_image = cv2.equalizeHist(gray_image)
equalized_hist = cv2.calcHist([equalized_image], [0], None, [256], [0, 256])
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
show_image_with_name(gray_image, 'Original Image', 'gray')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
plt.plot(original_hist, color='black')
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.text(128, max(original_hist)/2, name,
        color='red', fontsize=12,
        alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
show_image_with_name(equalized_image, 'Equalized Image', 'gray')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 4)
plt.plot(equalized_hist, color='black')
plt.title('Equalized Histogram')
plt.xlim([0, 256])
plt.text(128, max(equalized_hist)/2, name,
        color='red', fontsize=12,
        alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('histogram_equalization_result.png')
plt.show()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
name = "xyh"
def show_image_with_name(image, title, cmap=None):
plt.imshow(image, cmap=cmap)
plt.title(title)
plt.text(image.shape[1]//2, 10, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')
plt.axis('off')
image_path = 'img/test.png'
image = cv2.imread(image_path)
b, g, r = cv2.split(image)
clahe = cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5, tileGridSize=(10, 10))
b_clahe = clahe.apply(b)
g_clahe = clahe.apply(g)
r_clahe = clahe.apply(r)
equalized_image = cv2.merge((b_clahe, g_clahe, r_clahe))
colors = ('b', 'g', 'r')
plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.subplot(2, 2, 1)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Original Image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 2)
show_image_with_name(cv2.cvtColor(equalized_image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB), 'Equalized Image')
plt.subplot(2, 2, 3)
for i, color in enumerate(colors):
hist = cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256])
plt.plot(hist, color=color)
plt.title('Original Histogram')
plt.text(128, max(np.max(hist) for hist in [cv2.calcHist([image], [i], None, [256], [0, 256]) for i in range(3)])/2, name,
color='red', fontsize=12,
alpha=0.5, ha='center', va='center')

正确答案：
import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
img=cv2.imread("test.png")
b,g,r=cv2.split(img)
clah=cv2.createCLAHE(clipLimit=1.5,tileGridSize=(10,10))
equb=clah.apply(b)
equg=clah.apply(g)
equr=clah.apply(r)
img_new=cv2.merge([equb,equg,equr])
histb = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[0],None,[256],[0,255])
histg = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[1],None,[256],[0,255])
histr = cv2.calcHist([img_new],[2],None,[256],[0,255])
plt.plot(histb,color='b')
plt.plot(histg,color='g')
plt.plot(histr,color='r')
cv2.imshow("JXJ_img",img)
cv2.imshow("JXJ_img_new",img_new)
plt.show()
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

text:
读取img文件夹下的"test"。
- 读取图片，将图片通道进行分离。
- 分别对每个通道使用CLAHE进行均衡化（clipLimit设置为1.5，tileGridSize设置为10）
- 将均衡化后的三个通道融合
- 计算均衡化后的直方图并显示
- 将均衡化前后的图片显示并截图。
